M01S01S01.Title: Welcome to Module 1
M01S01S01.Text: # Touch your trackpad on your controller with your thumb to activate it. # Confirm the execution of the step by pressing green Next Step button.

M01S01S02.Title: VR Technology
M01S01S02.Text: # Take a closer look at highlighted objects located around you.

M01S01S03.Title: VR Technology
M01S01S03.Text: # Bring your hand to the wooden crate. # Push trigger or trackpad and transfer wooden crate to the floor.

M01S01S04.Title: VR Technology
M01S01S04.Text: # Touch highlighted buttons on your teachpendant.

M02S01S01.Title: Welcome to the Module 2
M02S01S01.Text: # Go to the next step when you finish listening to audio intructions.

M02S01S06.Title: Safety at work
M02S01S06.Text: # Locate a crate with safety padlock.

M02S01S07.Title: Safety at work
M02S01S07.Text: # Locate emergency stop (E-Stop) button on robot cabinet. # Locate E-Stop button near the door. # Locate E-Stop at the robot controller in your hand.

M02S02S01.Title: E-STOP
M02S02S01.Text: # Press any of E-Stop buttons. # Pay attention to the robot state, is it moving?

M02S02S02.Title: E-STOP
M02S02S02.Text: # Check the status of lights on control panel. # Check the status of lights on light column. # Check the status of lights on a cassette near the safety gate.

M02S02S03.Title: E-STOP
M02S02S03.Text: # Pull up all pushed E-Stop buttons.

M02S02S04.Title: E-STOP
M02S02S04.Text: # Confirm alarms related to the cell safety with SAFETY RESET button.

M02S02S05.Title: E-STOP
M02S02S05.Text: # Confirm other, non-safety related alarms with ALARM RESET button.

M02S02S06.Title: E-STOP
M02S02S06.Text: # Turn on automatic mode of the robotised cell with a START button.

M02S03S01.Title: Cell Safety
M02S03S01.Text: # Stop production with STOP button. # Make sure that robot was stopped.

M02S03S02.Title: Cell Safety
M02S03S02.Text: # Turn the key in the key switch to the T1 mode.

M02S03S03.Title: Cell Safety
M02S03S03.Text: # Put a safety cap on your head.

M02S03S05.Title: Cell Safety
M02S03S05.Text: # Take a padlock from a Lock Box placed on a robot cabinet. # Put a padlock on a entry gate lock.

M02S03S06.Title: Cell Safety
M02S03S06.Text: # Press the "Teleport" button to place yourself inside a cell.

M03S01S01.Title: Welcome to the Module 3
M03S01S01.Text: # Go to the next step when you finish listening to audio intructions.

M03S01S02.Title: Deadman's switch
M03S01S02.Text: # Check how the deadman's trigger works. # Press ACK button on keyboard to go to the next step.

M03S01S03.Title: Deadman's switch
M03S01S03.Text: # Press and hold one of deadman's trigger # Confirm pressing the deadman's trigger by pressing RESET button on the keyboard.

M03S02S01.Title: Articulated movement
M03S02S01.Text: # Press COORD button to change coordinate system.

M03S02S02.Title: Articulated movement
M03S02S02.Text: # Change coordinate system to JOINT with COORD button.

M03S02S03.Title: Articulated movement
M03S02S03.Text: # Press and hold deadman's trigger. # Delete all the alarms by pressing RESET button. # Move robot on the 1st axis with J1- and J1+ buttons.

M03S02S04.Title: Articulated movement
M03S02S04.Text: # Move robot on the 2nd axis with J2- and J2+ buttons. # Move robot on the 3rd axis with J3- and J3+ buttons. # Move robot on the 4th axis with J4- and J4+ buttons. # Move robot on the 5th axis with J5- and J5+ buttons. # Move robot on the 6th axis with J6- and J6+ buttons.

M03S03S01.Title: Axis limits
M03S03S01.Text: # Try to move any of robot axis to reach the limit.

M03S03S02.Title: Axis limits
M03S03S02.Text: # Press the reset button to delete an error. # Move the axis in the direction opposite to the limit.

M03S04S01.Title: Linear movement
M03S04S01.Text: # Choose BASE mode with COORD button.

M03S04S02.Title: Linear movement
M03S04S02.Text: # Move robot gripper with X- and X+ buttons.

M03S04S03.Title: Linear movement
M03S04S03.Text: # Move robot gripper with Y- and Y+ buttons.

M03S04S04.Title: Linear movement
M03S04S04.Text: # Move robot gripper with Z- and Z+ buttons.

M03S04S05.Title: Linear movement
M03S04S05.Text: # Rotate robot in relation to the X axis with Rx- or Rx+ buttons.

M03S04S06.Title: Linear movement
M03S04S06.Text: # Rotate robot in relation to the Y axis with Ry- or Ry+ buttons. # Rotate robot in relation to the Z axis with Rz- or Rz+ buttons.

M04S01S01.Title: Welcome to the Module 4
M04S01S01.Text: # Go to the next step when you finish listening to audio intructions.

M04S01S02.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S02.Text: # Close the gripper with TOOL ON button. # Open the gripper with TOOL OFF button. # Leave the gripper open.

M04S01S03.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S03.Text: # Choose JOINT movement mode with COORD button. # Place robot gripper in marked zone above the pallet. # Place the gripper with it's jaws pointing to the ground .

M04S01S04.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S04.Text: # Choose BASE movement mode with COORD button. # By pressing Z- button place the gripper in position to collect a pallet .

M04S01S05.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S05.Text: # Close the gripper with TOOL ON button.

M04S01S06.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S06.Text: # By pressing Z+ button place your gripper above conveyor.

M04S01S07.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S07.Text: # Change the movement mode to JOINT with COORD button. # Place the pallet above another conveyor by holding J1- button.

M04S01S08.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S08.Text: # Change the movement mode to BASE with COORD button. # Place the pallet gently on the conveyor by pressing Z- button.

M04S01S09.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S09.Text: # Open the gripper with TOOL OFF button. # By pressing Z+ button place your gripper above conveyor.

M04S01S10.Title: Simple paletization
M04S01S10.Text: # Place the robot in the highlighted spot.

M05S01S01.Title: Welcome to the fifth module
M05S01S01.Text: # Go to the next step when you finish listening to audio intructions.

M05S01S02.Title: Simple program
M05S01S02.Text: # Press MENU button on keyboard then select: "PROGRAM" -> "NEW". Confirm your action with "ENTER" button. # Highlight "NAME" option then press KEYBOARD button to name the program. Close keyboard by pressing ENTER.

M05S01S03.Title: Simple program
M05S01S03.Text: # Insert an articulated point. Press MENU that select "INSERT POINT" -> "J-JOINT".

M05S01S04.Title: Simple program
M05S01S04.Text: # Insert 3 empty lines beneath by pressing MENU -> "EDIT" -> "INSERT LINES BELOW". Insert value 3, press OK then ENTER.

M05S01S05.Title: Simple program
M05S01S05.Text: # Change robot movement speed to 80% with SPEED UP and SPEED DOWN buttons. # Change robot position manually.

M05S01S06.Title: Simple program
M05S01S06.Text: # Set a cursor in an empty line and insert linear point. Press MENU -> "INSERT POINT" -> "L - LINEAR".

M05S01S07.Title: Simple program
M05S01S07.Text: # Move robot arm as far as you want. # Set a cursor in the next empty line and insert linear point. Press MENU -> "INSERT POINT" -> "L - LINEAR".

M05S01S08.Title: Simple program
M05S01S08.Text: # Copy first line. Press MENU -> "EDIT" -> "COPY". # Paste the line in last empty line . Press MENU -> "EDIT" -> "PASTE".

M05S01S09.Title: Simple program
M05S01S09.Text: # Tune down robot movement speed to 50% with SPEED DOWN button. # Turn on step mode with STEP MODE button.

M05S01S10.Title: Simple program
M05S01S10.Text: # Press and hold deadman's trigger then confirm with RESET button to unlock robot drivers. # While in step mode press PLAY button to start a program.

M05S01S11.Title: Simple program
M05S01S11.Text: # While in step mode press PLAY to start next line of program.

M05S01S12.Title: Simple program
M05S01S12.Text: # Continue program execution in step mode to the last line.

M05S02S01.Title: Simple program - continuous mode
M05S02S01.Text: # Disable step mode with STEP MODE button. # Press PLAY to start the program.

M05S02S02.Title: Simple program - continuous mode
M05S02S02.Text: # While in continuous mode start the program with PLAY button. # With SPEED DOWN and SPEED UP buttons adjust robot movement speed while robot is moving.

M05S02S03.Title: Simple program - continuous mode
M05S02S03.Text: # While in continuous mode start the program one more time with PLAY button. # Press STOP while robot is moving. # Resume robot movement with PLAY button and wait for the end of the program.

M05S02S04.Title: Simple program - continuous mode
M05S02S04.Text: # Move the cursor to the third line of the program. # To move robot to the marked point press MOVE TO.

M05S02S05.Title: Simple program - continuous mode
M05S02S05.Text: # Move cursor to the first line and press MOVE TO.

M05S03S01.Title: Point parametrisation
M05S03S01.Text: # Place cursor in the second line. # With left and right arrows highlight a value on the right side of the APX symbol. # Change the APX value to 10.

M05S03S02.Title: Point parametrisation
M05S03S02.Text: # Place your cursor in the 3rd line. # With left and right arrows highlight value on the right side of the SPD symbol. # Change it to 500mm/s if it's linear point. If it's articulated point change it to 45%.

M05S03S03.Title: Point parametrisation
M05S03S03.Text: # Move a robot in any manner. # Place a cursor on the last line and ovverride coordinates of the point with REC button.

M05S03S04.Title: Point parametrisation
M05S03S04.Text: # Place your cursor in the second line. # Highlight "L" letter with arrows. # Press enter to change the point from linear to articualted.

M05S03S05.Title: Point parametrisation
M05S03S05.Text: # While in continuous mode, start a robot program with PLAY button.

M05S04S01.Title: Backup
M05S04S01.Text: # Press MENU -> "PROGRAM" -> "DUPLICATE..." # Select the target program by clicking ENTER, enter a name in the window, e.g. TEST5 and confirm.

M05S04S02.Title: Backup
M05S04S02.Text: # Press MENU -> "PROGRAM" -> "REMOVE…" than choose a rogram to remove. # Confirm with ENTER button.

M05S05S01.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S01.Text: # Press MENU, "PROGRAM" -> "NEW". # Press KEYBOARD and insert a name PALLET1. Confirm with ENTER.

M05S05S02.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S02.Text: # Insert articulated point. Press MENU, "INSERT POINT" -> "J - JOINT". # Change APX value to 10.

M05S05S03.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S03.Text: # Insert 10 empty lines. Press MENU, "EDIT" -> "INSERT LINES BELOW".

M05S05S04.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S04.Text: #Change to JOINT movement with COORD button. # Place a gripper over a pallet. # Set gripper vertically down to the pallet direction.

M05S05S05.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S05.Text: # Insert new point. Press MENU, "INSERT POINT" -> "J - JOINT".

M05S05S06.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S06.Text: # Change to BASE coordination system with COORD button. # By pressing Z- and Z+ place a robot in a position to grab palette in a way that gripper jaws will be placed between pallet's boards.

M05S05S07.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S07.Text: # Insert new point. Press MENU, "INSERT POINT" -> "L - LINEAR". # Change aproach speed - SPD - to 500mm/s. # Change APX (approximation) to 0.

M05S05S08.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S08.Text: # Press TOOL ON to close a gripper. # Add instruction that close a Gripper. Press MENU, "INSTRUCTIONS" -> "TOOL ON".

M05S05S09.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S09.Text: # Press COORD to switch to BASE. # Press Z+ and lift a pallet into the highlighted area.

M05S05S10.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S10.Text: # Create new point. Press MENU, "INSERT POINT" -> "L - LINEAR". # Change speed SPD to 500mm/s. # Change approximation APX to 50.

M05S05S11.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S11.Text: # Press COORD and change movement to JOINT. # With J1- change a robot position, to the point where it's halfway between conveyors, front to you. # Save the point in an empty line. Press MENU, "INSERT POINT" -> "J - JOINT".

M05S05S12.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S12.Text: # Change to JOINT movement with COORD button. # With J1- change robot's position to the point where it's over the second conveyor. # Save current position. Press MENU, "INSERT POINT" - "J - JOINT". # Change SPD to 100% # Change approximation APX to 20.

M05S05S13.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S13.Text: # Go to BASE with COORD button. # With Z- button place robot in a way that pallet should be gently touching a conveyor.

M05S05S14.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S14.Text: # Save current position. Press MENU, "POINT" -> "L - LINEAR". # Change SPD to 500mm/s. # Change approximation APX to 0.

M05S05S15.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S15.Text: # Press TOOL OFF to open the gripper. # Add instruction that opens the gripper. Press MENU, "INSTRUCTIONS" -> "TOOL OFF".

M05S05S16.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S16.Text: # Go to BASE with COORD button. # Press Z+ and move horizontally up. # Save currrent robot position. Press MENU, "INSERT POINT" -> "L - LINEAR".

M05S05S17.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S17.Text: # Place a cursor on the first line and copy the point. Press MENU, "EDIT" -> "COPY". # Place a cursor on an empty line and paste a point. Press MENU, "EDIT" -> "PASTE".

M05S05S18.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S18.Text: # Set the robot's key switch to T1 mode. # Make sure that continuous mode is on. # Unlock a robot nad start the program with PLAY button.

M05S05S19.Title: Advanced palletization
M05S05S19.Text: # Leave a cell and set the robot's key switch to T2 mode. # Execute the program with PLAY button.

M06S01S01.Title: Exam
M06S01S01.Text: Complete the tasks according to the knowledge you have acquired during the training. Press the confirmation button to start the exam. Good luck!

M06S02S01.Title: Exercise 1
M06S02S01.Text:
Complete task 1. When you have completed the task, confirm it with the step confirmation button.
Stop production at the robotic station and go inside the station.

M06S03S01.Title: Exercise 2
M06S03S01.Text:
Complete task 2. When you have completed the task, confirm it with the step confirmation button.
Resume production. Start the robot in automatic mode.

M06S04S01.Title: Exercise 3
M06S04S01.Text:
Complete task 3. When you have completed the task, confirm it with the step confirmation button.
Find the cause of the error and remove it. Then perform any movement with the robot in manual mode.

M06S05S01.Title: Exercise 4
M06S05S01.Text:
Complete task 4. When you have completed the task, confirm it with the step confirmation button.
Create a new program with any name and teach any trajectory consisting of 3 points. Run the program in STEP MODE.

M06S06S01.Title: Exercise 5
M06S06S01.Text:
Complete task 5. When you have completed the task, confirm it with the step confirmation button.
Create a program to pick and put away the pallet. Run it in continuous manual mode.

YellowLamp.Title: Entry request
YellowLamp.Text: Safely stops the robot at the end of execution cycle.

GreenLamp.Title: Start
GreenLamp.Text: Indicates that the robot is working in automatic mode.

Key.Title: Robot Modes Switch
Key.Text: Choose robot mode – T1, T2 or Auto.

GreenLamp.Title: Drives Status
GreenLamp.Text: Indicates that robot drives are unlocked.
